summary:
The Boeing 737 is a popular airplane made in the United States. It was designed to fly short distances and has a narrow body. The first 737 flew in 1967 and it has been improved over four generations. Each generation has gotten bigger and more fuel-efficient. The latest version, the 737 MAX, can carry up to 204 people.

More than 16,000 737s have been ordered, making it one of the most successful planes ever. It was the best-selling commercial plane until the Airbus A320 family took the lead.
title: Boeing 737
